love.text: For this is the way God loved the world: He gave his one and only Son, so that everyone who believes in him will not perish but have eternal life.
Love is patient, love is kind, it is not envious. Love does not brag, it is not puffed up.
The person who does not love does not know God because God is love.
For I am convinced that neither death, nor life, nor angels, nor heavenly rulers, nor things that are present, nor things to come, nor powers,
“I give you a new commandment—to love one another. Just as I have loved you, you also are to love one another.
We love because he loved us first.
But God demonstrates his own love for us, in that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us.
Dear friends, let us love one another, because love is from God, and everyone who loves has been fathered by God and knows God.
My commandment is this—to love one another just as I have loved you.
with all humility and gentleness, with patience, putting up with one another in love,

strength.text: But those who wait for the Lord’s help find renewed strength; they rise up as if they had eagles’ wings, they run without growing weary, they walk without getting tired.
I am able to do all things through the one who strengthens me.
For the music director, by the Korahites; according to the alamoth style; a song. God is our strong refuge; he is truly our helper in times of trouble.

He said to them, “Go and eat delicacies and drink sweet drinks and send portions to those for whom nothing is prepared. For this day is holy to our Lord. Do not grieve, for the joy of the Lord is your strength.”
By David. The Lord is my light and my salvation. I fear no one. The Lord protects my life. I am afraid of no one.
The one true God is my mighty refuge; he removes the obstacles in my way.
Don’t be afraid, for I am with you! Don’t be frightened, for I am your God! I strengthen you— yes, I help you— yes, I uphold you with my victorious right hand!
The one true God gives me strength; he removes the obstacles in my way.
The Lord is my strength and my song, and he has become my salvation. This is my God, and I will praise him, my father’s God, and I will exalt him.
Look, God is my deliverer! I will trust in him and not fear. For the Lord gives me strength and protects me; he has become my deliverer.”

hope.text: For I know what I have planned for you,’ says the Lord. ‘I have plans to prosper you, not to harm you. I have plans to give you a future filled with hope.
Now may the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you believe in him, so that you may abound in hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.
We have this hope as an anchor for the soul, sure and steadfast, which reaches inside behind the curtain,
Why are you depressed, O my soul? Why are you upset? Wait for God! For I will again give thanks to my God for his saving intervention.
And hope does not disappoint, because the love of God has been poured out in our hearts through the Holy Spirit who was given to us.
“My portion is the Lord,” I have said to myself, so I will put my hope in him.
As for me, I will wait continually, and will continue to praise you.
But those who wait for the Lord’s help find renewed strength; they rise up as if they had eagles’ wings, they run without growing weary, they walk without getting tired.
Now faith is being sure of what we hope for, being convinced of what we do not see.
I rely on the Lord. I rely on him with my whole being; I wait for his assuring word.

peace.text: “Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you; I do not give it to you as the world does. Do not let your hearts be distressed or lacking in courage.
And the peace of God that surpasses all understanding will guard your hearts and minds in Christ Jesus.
You keep completely safe the people who maintain their faith, for they trust in you.
Therefore, since we have been declared righteous by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ,
Let the peace of Christ be in control in your heart (for you were in fact called as one body to this peace), and be thankful.

Even if the mountains are removed and the hills displaced, my devotion will not be removed from you, nor will my covenant of friendship be displaced,” says the Lord, the one who has compassion on you.
Blessed are the peacemakers, for they will be called the children of God.
The Lord gives his people strength; the Lord grants his people security.
Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times and in every way. The Lord be with you all.
I have told you these things so that in me you may have peace. In the world you have trouble and suffering, but take courage—I have conquered the world.”

faith.text: Now faith is being sure of what we hope for, being convinced of what we do not see.

He told them, “It was because of your little faith. I tell you the truth, if you have faith the size of a mustard seed, you will say to this mountain, ‘Move from here to there,’ and it will move; nothing will be impossible for you.”
For the righteousness of God is revealed in the gospel from faith to faith, just as it is written, “The righteous by faith will live.”
For by grace you are saved through faith, and this is not from yourselves, it is the gift of God;
So also faith, if it does not have works, is dead being by itself.
Then Jesus said to him, “‘If you are able?’ All things are possible for the one who believes.”

I have been crucified with Christ, and it is no longer I who live, but Christ lives in me. So the life I now live in the body, I live because of the faithfulness of the Son of God, who loved me and gave himself for me.
Now without faith it is impossible to please him, for the one who approaches God must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who seek him.
Consequently faith comes from what is heard, and what is heard comes through the preached word of Christ.
And whatever you ask in prayer, if you believe, you will receive.”

comfort.text: Even when I must walk through the darkest valley, I fear no danger, for you are with me; your rod and your staff reassure me.
Blessed is the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of mercies and God of all comfort,
Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.
Don’t be afraid, for I am with you! Don’t be frightened, for I am your God! I strengthen you— yes, I help you— yes, I uphold you with my victorious right hand!
The Lord is near the brokenhearted; he delivers those who are discouraged.
Shout for joy, O sky! Rejoice, O earth! Let the mountains give a joyful shout! For the Lord consoles his people and shows compassion to the oppressed.
May your loyal love console me, as you promised your servant.
Now may our Lord Jesus Christ himself and God our Father, who loved us and by grace gave us eternal comfort and good hope,
“I will not abandon you as orphans, I will come to you.
When worries threaten to overwhelm me, your soothing touch makes me happy.

wisdom.text: Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and do not rely on your own understanding.
But if anyone is deficient in wisdom, he should ask God, who gives to all generously and without reprimand, and it will be given to him.
For the Lord gives wisdom, and from his mouth comes knowledge and understanding.
Wisdom is supreme—so acquire wisdom, and whatever you acquire, acquire understanding!
in whom are hidden all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge.
The beginning of wisdom is to fear the Lord, and acknowledging the Holy One is understanding.
But the wisdom from above is first pure, then peaceable, gentle, accommodating, full of mercy and good fruit, impartial, and not hypocritical.
How much better it is to acquire wisdom than gold; to acquire understanding is more desirable than silver.
For wisdom provides protection, just as money provides protection. But the advantage of knowledge is this: Wisdom preserves the life of its owner.
The one who acquires understanding loves himself; the one who preserves understanding will prosper.

grace.text: For by grace you are saved through faith, and this is not from yourselves, it is the gift of God;
But he said to me, “My grace is enough for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.” So then, I will boast most gladly about my weaknesses, so that the power of Christ may reside in me.
For the grace of God has appeared, bringing salvation to all people.
Therefore let us confidently approach the throne of grace to receive mercy and find grace whenever we need help.
For we have all received from his fullness one gracious gift after another.
But they are justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus.
But he gives greater grace. Therefore it says, “God opposes the proud, but he gives grace to the humble.”
And, after you have suffered for a little while, the God of all grace who called you to his eternal glory in Christ will himself restore, confirm, strengthen, and establish you.
Now the law came in so that the transgression may increase, but where sin increased, grace multiplied all the more,
So you, my child, be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus.

joy.text: He said to them, “Go and eat delicacies and drink sweet drinks and send portions to those for whom nothing is prepared. For this day is holy to our Lord. Do not grieve, for the joy of the Lord is your strength.”
You lead me in the path of life. I experience absolute joy in your presence; you always give me sheer delight.
I have told you these things so that my joy may be in you, and your joy may be complete.
My brothers and sisters, consider it nothing but joy when you fall into all sorts of trials,
But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness,
Now may the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you believe in him, so that you may abound in hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.
The Lord did indeed accomplish great things for us. We were happy.
Indeed you will go out with joy; you will be led along in peace; the mountains and hills will give a joyful shout before you, and all the trees in the field will clap their hands.
But the angel said to them, “Do not be afraid! Listen carefully, for I proclaim to you good news that brings great joy to all the people:
You have not seen him, but you love him. You do not see him now but you believe in him, and so you rejoice with an indescribable and glorious joy,

all.text: For this is the way God loved the world: He gave his one and only Son, so that everyone who believes in him will not perish but have eternal life.
A psalm of David. The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing.
I am able to do all things through the one who strengthens me.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and do not rely on your own understanding.
And we know that all things work together for good for those who love God, who are called according to his purpose,
Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
Don’t be afraid, for I am with you! Don’t be frightened, for I am your God! I strengthen you— yes, I help you— yes, I uphold you with my victorious right hand!
For the music director, by the Korahites; according to the alamoth style; a song. God is our strong refuge; he is truly our helper in times of trouble.
For I know what I have planned for you,’ says the Lord. ‘I have plans to prosper you, not to harm you. I have plans to give you a future filled with hope.
Do not be conformed to this present world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind, so that you may test and approve what is the will of God—what is good and well-pleasing and perfect.
I repeat, be strong and brave! Don’t be afraid and don’t panic, for I, the Lord your God, am with you in all you do.”
By David. The Lord is my light and my salvation. I fear no one. The Lord protects my life. I am afraid of no one.
For God did not give us a Spirit of fear but of power and love and self-control.
But those who wait for the Lord’s help find renewed strength; they rise up as if they had eagles’ wings, they run without growing weary, they walk without getting tired.
A song of ascents. I look up toward the hills. From where does my help come?
But above all pursue his kingdom and righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.
For I am convinced that neither death, nor life, nor angels, nor heavenly rulers, nor things that are present, nor things to come, nor powers,
I sought the Lord’s help and he answered me; he delivered me from all my fears.
Now faith is being sure of what we hope for, being convinced of what we do not see.
“Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you; I do not give it to you as the world does. Do not let your hearts be distressed or lacking in courage.
נ (Nun) Your word is a lamp to walk by and a light to illumine my path.
When you pass through the waters, I am with you; when you pass through the streams, they will not overwhelm you. When you walk through the fire, you will not be burned; the flames will not harm you.
Now may the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you believe in him, so that you may abound in hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.
Then you will take delight in the Lord, and he will answer your prayers.
teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And remember, I am with you always, to the end of the age.”
As for you, the one who lives in the shelter of the Most High, and resides in the protective shadow of the Sovereign One—
Commit your works to the Lord, and your plans will be established.
I have told you these things so that in me you may have peace. In the world you have trouble and suffering, but take courage—I have conquered the world.”
I will give you thanks because your deeds are awesome and amazing. You knew me thoroughly;
because if you confess with your mouth that Jesus is Lord and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved.
You keep completely safe the people who maintain their faith, for they trust in you.
I will instruct and teach you about how you should live. I will advise you as I look you in the eye.
You are the light of the world. A city located on a hill cannot be hidden.
Keep thinking about things above, not things on the earth,
May my words and my thoughts be acceptable in your sight, O Lord, my sheltering rock and my redeemer.
But to all who have received him—those who believe in his name—he has given the right to become God’s children—
But God demonstrates his own love for us, in that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us.
This is the day the Lord has brought about. We will be happy and rejoice in it.
“Indeed, my plans are not like your plans, and my deeds are not like your deeds,” says the Lord,
So then, do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself. Today has enough trouble of its own.
When I am afraid, I trust in you.
There is therefore now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus.
Train a child in the way that he should go, and when he is old he will not turn from it.
Then Jesus spoke out again, “I am the light of the world! The one who follows me will never walk in darkness but will have the light of life.”
As far as the eastern horizon is from the west, so he removes the guilt of our rebellious actions from us.
The grass dries up, the flowers wither, but the decree of our God is forever reliable.”
“Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened for you.
Rejoice in hope, endure in suffering, persist in prayer.
Rely on the Lord! Be strong and confident! Rely on the Lord!
The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy; I have come so that they may have life, and may have it abundantly.
Do not be anxious about anything. Instead, in every situation, through prayer and petition with thanksgiving, tell your requests to God.
Be strong and confident, all you who wait on the Lord.

Even if the mountains are removed and the hills displaced, my devotion will not be removed from you, nor will my covenant of friendship be displaced,” says the Lord, the one who has compassion on you.
Take my yoke on you and learn from me because I am gentle and humble in heart, and you will find rest for your souls.
What then shall we say about these things? If God is for us, who can be against us?
The Lord is my high ridge, my stronghold, my deliverer. My God is my rocky summit where I take shelter, my shield, the horn that saves me, and my refuge.
Acknowledge him in all your ways, and he will make your paths straight.
“I am the vine; you are the branches. The one who remains in me—and I in him—bears much fruit because apart from me you can accomplish nothing.
Even when I must walk through the darkest valley, I fear no danger, for you are with me; your rod and your staff reassure me.
No, in all these things we have complete victory through him who loved us!
“Look, I am about to do something new. Now it begins to happen! Do you not recognize it? Yes, I will make a road in the wilderness and paths in the wastelands.

He told them, “It was because of your little faith. I tell you the truth, if you have faith the size of a mustard seed, you will say to this mountain, ‘Move from here to there,’ and it will move; nothing will be impossible for you.”
The Lord is near the brokenhearted; he delivers those who are discouraged.
Jesus replied, “I am the way, and the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
Therefore I exhort you, brothers and sisters, by the mercies of God, to present your bodies as a sacrifice—alive, holy, and pleasing to God—which is your reasonable service.
For he will order his angels to protect you in all you do.
Guard your heart with all vigilance, for from it are the sources of life.
He gives strength to those who are tired; to the ones who lack power, he gives renewed energy.
In the same way, let your light shine before people, so that they can see your good deeds and give honor to your Father in heaven.
nor height, nor depth, nor anything else in creation will be able to separate us from the love of God in Christ Jesus our Lord.
Commit your future to the Lord. Trust in him, and he will act on your behalf.
Jesus said to them, “I am the bread of life. The one who comes to me will never go hungry, and the one who believes in me will never be thirsty.
The Lord will protect you from all harm; he will protect your life.
Seek the Lord while he makes himself available; call to him while he is nearby!
Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and the Son and the Holy Spirit,
For everyone who calls on the name of the Lord will be saved.
He says, “Stop your striving and recognize that I am God. I will be exalted over the nations! I will be exalted over the earth!”
A person plans his course, but the Lord directs his steps.
Jesus said to her, “I am the resurrection and the life. The one who believes in me will live even if he dies,
By David. The Lord is my light and my salvation. I fear no one. The Lord protects my life. I am afraid of no one.
And hope does not disappoint, because the love of God has been poured out in our hearts through the Holy Spirit who was given to us.
Now, this is what the Lord says, the one who created you, O Jacob, and formed you, O Israel: “Don’t be afraid, for I will protect you. I call you by name, you are mine.
So pray this way: “Our Father in heaven, may your name be honored,
Taste and see that the Lord is good. How blessed is the one who takes shelter in him.
For God did not send his Son into the world to condemn the world, but that the world should be saved through him.
Be devoted to one another with mutual love, showing eagerness in honoring one another.
In my heart I store up your words, so I might not sin against you.
Trust in the Lord from this time forward, even in Yah, the Lord, an enduring protector!
But I say to you, love your enemy and pray for those who persecute you,
And we know that all things work together for good for those who love God, who are called according to his purpose,
Surely your goodness and faithfulness will pursue me all my days, and I will live in the Lord’s house for the rest of my life.
Do not let mercy and truth leave you; bind them around your neck, write them on the tablet of your heart.
God is spirit, and the people who worship him must worship in spirit and truth.”
The Lord is on my side; I am not afraid. What can people do to me?
For I am the Lord your God, the one who takes hold of your right hand, who says to you, ‘Don’t be afraid, I am helping you.’
In everything, treat others as you would want them to treat you, for this fulfills the law and the prophets.
